message.entry: The function spaceToDepth requires a dlarray input with minimum one and maximum two spatial dimension.
The function spaceToDepth requires a formatted dlarray input with channel dimension.
{0} must be a scalar or a row vector of two scalar values.
Value of both output spatial dimension (OutputHeight = floor(InputHeight/blockSize(1) or OutputWidth = floor(InputWidth/blockSize(2)) must be either one or greater than one.
Space to depth with block size {0}
Inputs with more than four dimensions are not supported
